channel.description: RevisionPod - English revision made easy.Follow us on Twitter @GRevisionpodEvery week, Mr Forster and Mr Gallie bring you a dose of high energy revision to help you achieve the best possible marks in your English GCSE's. Click on the bio of each episode to download your GCSE RevisionPod handout, complete with the question we are discussing, the quotations and vocabulary we use in the pod and some extra contextual information.

item.title: AQA Language Paper 1, Question 2 - Language Analysis
item.description:
It’s time to make the leap—the leap across borders and boundaries into a new world both beautiful and terrifying in equal measure. That’s right, we speak, of course, about the leap from literature to language.

This week we tackle AQA language paper one, question two. Make sure you download the resources below as you listen along; they should really help you!

Here is the handout for this episode: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fZ-iYUI_CzkxrA8O6anaSUJLZ2atrfU8

Here is a pack going through the whole of Language Paper 1: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1rJ5zh4MVU2FT3QZyWDwpQ8koW7nVU-Sb

Happy revising!

item.title: AQA Language Paper 1 - Question 3 - Structural Analysis
item.description:
It’s time to step back, waaaaay back. So far back that you can observe the overall shape and structure of the extract. Put down your language analysis microscope, step back and enjoy the view. Forget about the effect of individual words and phrases and think about where the writer is pointing that focus and where and why that changes. Sounds like fun... right?
